plot: Jonathan and Gabrielle are travelling along the highway by motorcycle. Pausing at a rest stop, they decide to deepen their knowledge of each other by asking questions that were sometimes banal and other times serious.
title: Jonathan et Gabrielle
plot_es: Jonathan and Gabrielle are travelling along the highway by motorcycle. Pausing at a rest stop, they decide to deepen their knowledge of each other by asking questions that were sometimes banal and other times serious.
plot_en: Jonathan and Gabrielle are travelling along the highway by motorcycle. Pausing at a rest stop, they decide to deepen their knowledge of each other by asking questions that were sometimes banal and other times serious.
